body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
A clear and concise description of what the problem is. Ex. I'm always frustrated when [...]
Upon namespace failover, each shard will create a failover timer queue and a failover transfer queue. Those 2 * # of shards queues will start task load at almost the same time and cause a spike in persistence requests and affect service availability.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.

Add a host level rate limiter for failover queue as a short term solution.

In long term, task [guarantee execution](https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/pull/2864) work and multicursor will eliminate standby queue and failover queue, so we don't encounter this problem.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

**Additional context**
Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.
title: Rate limit failover queue task loading
